page.title: 11Tipton Carnival
page.content: Tipton Carnival is an event which is held every year.There is a procession which goes through all the streets of Tipton.There are people who are dressed up collecting money for charities. There is a band which marches in front of the carnival floats.The floats are lorries decorated according to a special theme such as Alice in Wonderland or Snow White and the Seven Dwarves.Then the procession goes to Jubilee Park where there is a fair.There you can go on many fairground rides which cost 40p each.The fair stays there for three days.In the afternoons the entrance fee is 25p,but after six o'clock you can get in free.The fair finishes at midnight on Sunday.You then have to wait another year for it to come again.
